text:
A problem with 1.2RC2 on Windows 2000:

First I had these problems with the exported static site of the default 
publication in G:\Lenya12
\build\lenya\webapp\lenya\pubs\default\work\export\pending\default\live\

1. the path to the css file is absolute and not 
correct: "/default/live/css/page.css"

2. The png-picture is not used because the absolute path is 
wrong: "file:///G:/default/live/images/project-logo.png"

To work arround these problems and look at the files I copied the "default"-
directory to G:\ and opened G:\default\live\index.html with a browser.

The navigation parts of the pages are inconsistent. For the pages which were 
published first the navigation does not contain the pages which were added 
later. It looks like the pages are not updated when the navigation info changes.
creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de

The directory I am looking at is this one:
build/lenya/webapp/lenya/pubs/default/work/export/pending/default/live/
(export and the other directories below it do not contain any files)

I have set the milestone to 1.2 because (at least for me) Lenya is useless if

Maybe this problem is somehow related to bug 22850 ?
